hm2AgentSflowSourceInterface.name: hm2AgentSflowSourceInterface
hm2AgentSflowSourceInterface.description: A source-interface selection on an Interface Index (like vlan based routing interface, port based routing interface, loopback interface, tunnel interface). A non-zero value indicates ifIndex for the corresponding interface entry in the ifTable is selected. A zero value indicates source-interface is un-configured.
